item.title: Resources: Curated Lists
item.description:
A collection of carefully selected resources I’ve found valuable in my learning journey. Updated regularly.

Development & Programming

  • FreeCodeCamp - Free coding curriculum
  • The Odin Project - Full-stack JavaScript/Ruby learning path
  • JavaScript.info - Modern JavaScript tutorial
  • Python Crash Course - Excellent Python primer

Design & UX

  • Refactoring UI - Practical design tips for developers
  • Laws of UX - UX principles collection
  • Figma Fundamentals - Official Figma guides

Learning Platforms

  • Coursera - University-level courses
  • Frontend Masters - In-depth front-end courses
  • Egghead.io - Bite-sized coding lessons

Tools & Utilities

  • Regexr - Regular expression tester
  • Coolors - Color scheme generator
  • Can I Use - Browser compatibility checker

Blogs & Newsletters

  • CSS-Tricks
  • Smashing Magazine
  • Bytes.dev - JavaScript newsletter

item.title: Hello you there!
item.description:
Muondingu
lvl 99
D-Sketon
Astro Âª∫Á´ô

About Me

I’m a self-proclaimed lazy optimizer on a mission to build perfect systems that do the work for me. My journey into knowledge management and automation wasn’t born from productivity evangelism, it came from a deep desire to minimize effort while maximizing results.

The Lazy Perfectionist Approach

I believe the best system is one that requires minimal maintenance while delivering maximum value. My obsession with tools like Obsidian and n8n stems from their potential to create “logic gates” for human interactions- systems that make decisions and respond more effectively than my tired brain could on its own!!
